short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for enhancing Fastmail experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of an email inbox that's uncomfortable to look at?
With Fastmail Enhanced, multiply your visibility and comfort by a hundred using your accounts on Fastmail.

Fastmail Enhanced makes the following changes to Fastmail:
- Adds avatars to the email list
- Adds an indicator to create a visual grouping of dates
- Reply cards are separated and not stacked
- Fixes improper margins in plain text emails
- Unread messages are colored with your configured accent color
- Minor aesthetic improvements

v1.1
- Fixed the top date adjustment button that was duplicated in certain circumstances.
- Fixed an issue where the extension sometimes did not load.

v1.2
- Added support for the domain betaapp.fastmail.com.
- Added an option to change the avatar size or to hide them.
- Replaced the top button with an options button to control all settings.
- VIP stars will now be displayed with the accent color to stand out


Donations: https://ko-fi.com/fifth_vertex
